snippet: After the cancellation of the New York City Marathon, race options ranged from Pennsylvania to Antarctica, and some events offered discounts.
abstract: Cancellation of New York City Marathon forces many runners to seek other race options; in some places, like Santa Barbara, organizers are adding slots and offering discounts for runners who provide proof that they were registered for the New York City Marathon.
lead_paragraph: After the cancellation of the New York City Marathon, race options ranged from Pennsylvania to Antarctica, and some events offered discounts.

headline.seo: New York Marathon Runners Go Great Distances for Other Options
headline.main: Options for Runners After a Race Is Canceled
headline.print_headline: Options for Runners After a Race Is Canceled
